verses.name: Matthew 18:13
verses.text: And if so be that he find it, verily I say unto you, he rejoiceth more of that sheep, than of the ninety and nine which went not astray.

verses.name: Matthew 18:14
verses.text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven, that one of these little ones should perish.

verses.name: Matthew 18:15
verses.text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee, go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone: if he shall hear thee, thou hast gained thy brother.
